attributes.action: order the freezing of the Madeleine McCann fund until the parents have been removed as suspects from the enquiry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the McCann family should not have access to over £1M in funds which has been donated by the public until they have been renounced as suspects in the case.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
